titleInfo.title: Discussion - Pioneers of the Bakersfield Sound - 2012-03-24

mods.abstract: Panel discussion billed as Together Again: Pioneers of the Bakersfield Sound from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on March 24, 2012. Companion to a Bakersfield exhibit.

subject.topic: Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.)
